import React, {Fragment, useState} from 'react'; const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name:'', email:'', password: '', password2: '' }); const {name, email, password, password2} = formData; //now to associate name to the apropriate input field i need to add "value={name} on the first input" //but doing that i cant type anything there -> add a function onChange={e => onChange(e)} const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData, name:e.target.value}); return (

onChange(e)} required />

) } export default Register;
